content.rendered:
2020 Winter Classic Tickets

Your custom 2020 Winter Classic includes tickets in your preferred seating location in the Cotton Bowl. For outdoor hockey games, generally the higher up you are, the better the sight lines. Our Sports Travel Specialists will help you select the perfect tickets for you, based on your preferences.

The 2020 Winter Classic will take place in the iconic Cotton Bowl. The stadium has a long history, dating back to 1930. It was the longtime host of the college football game of the same name, and has hosted a variety of events from NFL games to Soccer World Cup matches, to major entertainment acts. With a capacity of over 92,000, it could see a huge crowd for the 2020 Winter Classic.

Standard Package Seating Categories

Upper Level End / Corner
Sections: 101-103 / 109-125 / 131-144

Lower Level End / Corner
Sections: 1-3 / 9-21 / 27-36

Upper Level Side
Sections: 104-108 / 126-130

Lower Level Side
Sections: 4-8 / 22-26
